mapper.insert: insert into tb_task set theme = #{theme}, `desc` = #{desc}, publisher_id = #{publisherId}, executor_id = #{executorId}, publish_time = #{publishTime}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, task_status = #{taskStatus}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.theme, t.desc, u1.name as publisherName, u2.name as executorName, DATE_FORMAT(t.publish_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as publishTime, DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as endTime, t.task_status as taskStatus, t.rate, t.percent from tb_task as t inner join tb_user as u1 on t.publisher_id = u1.id inner join tb_user as u2 on t.executor_id = u2.id where t.id = #{id}
